com.igormaznitsa.prol.io
Interface ProlTextReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProlMemoryPipe, ProlTextInputStream
public interface ProlTextReader

The interface describea s prol text reader i.e. an object which allows to read tokens, terms and chars from somewhere

Author:
Igor Maznitsa (igor.maznitsa@igormaznitsa.com)

Method Summary
 void close()
          Close the reader
 java.lang.String getResourceId()
          Get the resource id for the reader
 TermInteger readChar()
          Read the next char code as a TermInteger
 Term readTerm()
          Read the next term (dot ended)
 Term readToken()
          Read the next token
 

Method Detail

readToken

Term readToken()
               throws java.io.IOException
Read the next token

Returns:
the next token or the END_OF_FILE term if the stream end has been reached
Throws:
java.io.IOException - it will be thrown if there is any transport error during the operation

readTerm

Term readTerm()
              throws java.io.IOException
Read the next term (dot ended)

Returns:
the next term or the END_OF_FILE term if the stream end has been reached
Throws:
java.io.IOException - it will be thrown if there is any transport or logical error during the operation

readChar

TermInteger readChar()
                     throws java.io.IOException
Read the next char code as a TermInteger

Returns:
the next char code or -1 if the stream end has been reached
Throws:
java.io.IOException - it will be thrown if there is any transport or logical error during the operation

getResourceId

java.lang.String getResourceId()
Get the resource id for the reader

Returns:
the resource id as a String object

close

void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
Close the reader

Throws:
java.io.IOException - it will be thrown if there is any error during the operation
